org.apache.hama.bsp

Class BSPPeerImpl<K1,V1,K2,V2,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hama.bsp.BSPPeerImpl<K1,V1,K2,V2,M>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BSPPeer<K1,V1,K2,V2,M>, Constants

    public final class BSPPeerImpl<K1,V1,K2,V2,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
extends Object
implements BSPPeer<K1,V1,K2,V2,M>
    This class represents a BSP peer.

           TaskStatus.State state)
            throws Exception
        BSPPeer Constructor. BSPPeer acts on behalf of clients performing bsp() tasks.
        Parameters:
        conf - is the configuration file containing bsp peer host, port, etc.
        umbilical - is the bsp protocol used to contact its parent process.
        taskId - is the id that current process holds.

        Exception
